rooms.name: Dungeon Entrance
rooms.description: A damp stone archway leads into darkness. A cold breeze brushes past you as if the dungeon itself has taken notice.

objects.name: stone button
objects.description: A worn stone button is set into the wall at shoulder height.

appearance.coinsTemplate: You see {coinCount} gold coin(s) glinting on the floor.
appearance.emptyCoinsTemplate: The floor is bare and dusty.

rooms.name: Narrow Hallway
rooms.description: The walls are slick with moisture. The corridor stretches into shadow both east and west.

appearance.coinsTemplate: Loose coins sparkle in the gloom.

rooms.name: Treasure Room
rooms.description: Piles of broken chests and scattered trinkets lie here, remnants of earlier adventurers.

objects.name: ancient chest
objects.description: An ancient chest with iron bands, slightly ajar.

appearance.coinsTemplate: Gold coins spill from broken chests; you count {coinCount}.
appearance.emptyCoinsTemplate: The gold is gone, leaving only splinters and dust.
